pages.text: The various mountain types are relatively common, in total. Mountains, in general, are quite steep and due to how world generation works, there are often smaller floating islands, that most of the time only consist of a few blocks.$(br2)In the underground of the mountains, $(l:mobs/silverfish)silverfish blocks$() generate.

At the edges of the mountains, the rare Mountain Edge biome might appear (not always). The Wooded Mountains are basically a forest on top of the mountains.$(br2)Gravelly Mountains and their Modified variant are a subtype of mountains that have their first few surface layers covered with $(l:blocks/gravel)gravel$().$(br2)$(l:blocks/llama)Llamas$() are typical for mountains, they don't spawn anywhere else.
Mountains have special variants of $(l:structures/village)villages$() that spawn there.
